thread.title: BRIEF-Steelcase Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.24

title: BRIEF-Steelcase Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.24
text: March 20, 2018 / 8:26 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Steelcase Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.24 Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Steelcase Inc: * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.24 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.16 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 REVENUE $772.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $750.7 MILLION * SEES Q1 2019 REVENUE $740 MILLION TO $765 MILLION * QUARTERLY DIVIDEND INCREASED BY 6 PERCENT TO $0.135 PER SHARE * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.19, REVENUE VIEW $746.6 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * RECORDED $27.9 MILLION OF CHARGES IN Q4, PRIMARILY RELATED TO U.S. TAX REFORM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
